attributes.action: UK Violent and Sex Offender Register (VISOR) should be made public like USA site: nsopw.gov
attributes.additional_details:
The Violent and Sex Offender Register (VISOR) should be made public to protect the public from paedophiles and violent criminals.

The USA has www.nsopw.gov. Why can't the UK have a website like that to protect the British public from paedophiles and violent criminals from within the UK.

Share this on facebook.com to spread the word.
